com.hellokaton.blade

类 Blade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hellokaton.blade.Blade

  • public class Blade
extends Object
    Blade Core

    The Blade is the core operating class of the framework, which can be used to register routes, modify the template engine, set the file list display, static resource directory, and so on.

    作者:
    hellokaton 2017/5/31

    • 构造器概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • create

        public static Blade create()
        Give your blade instance, from then on will get the energy
        返回:
        return blade instance

      • of

        @Deprecated
public static Blade of()
        已过时。 

      • ioc

        public Ioc ioc()
        Get blade ioc container, default is SimpleIoc implement.

        IOC container will help you hosting Bean or component, it is actually a Map inside. In the blade in a single way to make objects reuse, you can save resources, to avoid the terrible memory leak

        返回:
        return ioc container

      • routerMapping

        public Blade routerMapping(DynamicMapping dynamicMapping)
        set url router, default is RegexMapping if you want a faster router, you can set TrieMapping for example : routerMapping(new TrieMapping())
        参数:
        dynamicMapping - see DynamicMapping
        返回:
        blade instance

        public Blade get(@NonNull
                 @NonNull String path,

                 @NonNull RouteHandler handler)
        Add a get route to routes
        参数:
        path - your route path
        handler - route implement
        返回:
        blade instance

      • bootConf

        public Blade bootConf(@NonNull
                      @NonNull String bootConf)
        Set to start blade configuration file by default Boot config properties file in classpath directory.

        Without setting will read the classpath -> application.properties

        参数:
        bootConf - boot config file name
        返回:
        blade

      • environment

        public Environment environment()
        Return the application's environment configuration information.
        返回:
        Environment

        public Optional<String> getEnv(String key)
        Get application environment information.
        参数:
        key - environment key
        返回:
        environment optional value

      • getEnv

        public String getEnv(String key,
                     String defaultValue)
        Get application environment information.
        参数:
        key - environment key
        defaultValue - default value, if value is null
        返回:
        environment optional value

      • listen

        public Blade listen(@NonNull
                    @NonNull String address,
                    int port)
        Set to start the web server to listen the IP address and port The default will listen 0.0.0.0:9000
        参数:
        address - ip address
        port - web server port
        返回:
        blade

      • start

        public Blade start(String... args)
        Start blade application.

        When all the routing in the main function of situations you can use, Otherwise please do not call this method.

        返回:
        return blade instance

      • start

        public Blade start(Class<?> mainCls,
                   String... args)
        Start blade application
        参数:
        mainCls - main Class, the main class bag is basic package
        args - command arguments
        返回:
        return blade instance

      • await

        public Blade await()
        Await web server started
        返回:
        return blade instance

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop current blade application

        Will stop synchronization waiting netty service

        public Blade bannerText(String bannerText)
        Set blade start banner text
